summary: Five Indians living in London find themselves thrown together when two of them are implicated for a bomb blast. An Indian lawyer enters the scene to bail them out of their predicament.
cast: Anil Kapoor|Sunil Shetty|Arshad Warsi|Emraan Hashmi|Irrfan Khan|Tanushree Dutta|Mumait Khan|Emma Bunton|Delia Antal|Kelly Dorji|Jag Mundhra|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Sushma Reddy|Frank Scantori|Iman Sid|Aseem Tiwari|Steven Wickham
title: Chocolate: Deep Dark Secrets
